scripts.build: npm run tsc && npm run build.native
scripts.test.android: npm run tsc && npm run tslint && cd ../demo && tns build android && tns test android --justlaunch
scripts.test.ios: npm run tsc && npm run tslint && cd ../demo && tns build ios && tns test ios --justlaunch
scripts.demo.ios: npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns run ios --syncAllFiles --emulator
scripts.demo.prepare-ios: npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns prepare ios
scripts.demo.android: npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns run android --syncAllFiles --emulator
scripts.demo.reset: cd ../demo && npx rimraf -- hooks node_modules platforms package-lock.json
scripts.plugin.prepare: npm run build && cd ../demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-clevertap && tns plugin add ../src
scripts.generate.typings.ios: cd ../demo && TNS_DEBUG_METADATA_PATH="$(pwd)/metadata" tns build ios --for-device && TNS_TYPESCRIPT_DECLARATIONS_PATH="$(pwd)/typings" tns build ios --for-device && echo 'Now look for your library typings in demo/typings!'
scripts.generate.typings.android: echo 'Make sure you have the android-dts-generator in your workspace folder!' && java -jar ../../android-dts-generator/dts-generator/build/libs/dts-generator.jar -input ./platforms/android-libs/clevertap-android-3.3.0.jar -output platforms/android/typings
scripts.demo.clean: npm run demo.reset && npx rimraf -- node_modules package-lock.json && npm i
scripts.plugin.clean: npx rimraf -- node_modules package-lock.json && npm i
